author: MrCheerfull

review: LOVE LOVE LOVE Amazon Fire TV Stick! We don't have cable, we have the interwebs and then utilize Prime and other such things. We used to have our laptop hooked up via HDMI to the TV, and then have to use the laptop to find what we were to watch. I love that it comes with a remote. Setup and navigation is SO EASY, even my mom who is not tech-savvy AT ALL was able to set up hers. You plug it into your HDMI and USB charge (whether that's into the wall with the adapter provided or into TV USB). That's it. There are so many apps available AND GAMES.
author: heather elftman
